str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
Peter, a Greek name meaning rock. Apparently a primary word; a rock; as a name, Petrus, an apostle.
A cock, rooster. From aleko; a cock or male fowl.
No, not. Also ouk, and ouch a primary word; the absolute negative adverb; no or not.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From phone; to emit a sound; by implication, to address in words or by name, also in imitation.
Today, now. Neuter of a presumed compound of the article ho and hemera; on the day; generally, now.
A conjunction, preposition and adverb of continuance, until.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Middle - 2nd Person Singular
str2: From apo and arneomai; to deny utterly, i.e. Disown, abstain.
Three times. Adverb from treis; three times.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
